raw_body: Family wishes to inform the demise of Mrs. E.R. Tillekeratne of 72/6, Chakkindarama Road, Ratmalana. Remains lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour, Mount Lavinia from 9.00 a.m. to 2.30 p.m. on 10th May. Service will be held at St. Thomas’ College, Mount Lavinia Chapel from 3.00 p.m. to 4.00 p.m. Buriel at Mount Lavinia Cemetery at 4.30 p.m. 118695
